caption.center: THOMAS G. MATTHEWS v. LEE ROY FRANTOM ET AL.

opinion.posture: IN RE: MARYLAND CASUALTY COMPANY APPLYING FOR CERTIORARI, OR WRIT OF REVIEW, TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, FIRST CIRCUIT, PARISH OF EAST BATON ROUGE.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] The application is denied. There appears no error in the judgment complained of.
